ASAP - Another Slight Atari Player
==================================

link:/[Home]
image:http://sflogo.sourceforge.net/sflogo.php?group_id=154391&amp;type=13["Get ASAP - Another Slight Atari Player at SourceForge.net. Fast, secure and Free Open Source software downloads",width=120,height=30,link="http://sourceforge.net/projects/asap/"]

Silverlight demo
----------------

This page contains a Silverlight player of Atari music.

++++
<object id="asap" width="0" height="0" type="application/x-silverlight-2" data="data:application/x-silverlight-2,">
	<param name="source" value="SilverASAP.xap" />
	<param name="initParams" value="file=X_Ray_2.sap" />
	<a href="http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=124807" style="text-decoration: none;">
		<img src="http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=108181" alt="Get Microsoft Silverlight" style="border-style: none" />
	</a>
</object>
<input type="button" value="Play" onclick="document.getElementById('asap').Content.ASAP.Play('X_Ray_2.sap')" />
<input type="button" value="Pause" onclick="document.getElementById('asap').Content.ASAP.Pause()" />
<input type="button" value="Stop" onclick="document.getElementById('asap').Content.ASAP.Stop()" />
++++
